channel.title: CVE Feed for StoreApps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StoreApps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25649|2024-09-16T17:38:36.142Z -- storeapps -- affiliate%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Improper Access Control vulnerabilities in StoreApps Affiliate For WooCommerce premium plugin <= 4.7.0 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40694|2024-09-16T18:39:23.704Z -- storeapps -- news%20announcement%20scroll%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in News Announcement Scroll plugin <= 8.8.8 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-34619|2024-09-16T22:35:25.662Z -- storeapps -- woocommerce%20stock%20manager
item.description: The WooCommerce Stock Manager WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery leading to Arbitrary File Upload in versions up to, and including, 2.5.7 due to missing nonce and file validation in the /woocommerce-stock-manager/trunk/admin/views/import-export.php file.

item.title: CVE-2022-36284|2024-09-16T18:19:49.150Z -- storeapps -- affiliate%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated IDOR vulnerability in StoreApps Affiliate For WooCommerce premium plugin <= 4.7.0 at WordPress allows an attacker to change the PayPal email. WooCommerce PayPal Payments plugin (free) should be at least installed to get the extra input field on the user profile page.
